block.p: LEAD: Youngsters warming up before taking part in Tap-O-Mania, an annual mass tap dance on West 34th Street yesterday. To the music of ''There's No Business like Show Business'' 4,497 participants donned hats and T-shirts for the tap dance, surpassing a record set recently in Scotland. (NYT/Ruby Washington)

LEAD: Youngsters warming up before taking part in Tap-O-Mania, an annual mass tap dance on West 34th Street yesterday. To the music of ''There's No Business like Show Business'' 4,497 participants donned hats and T-shirts for the tap dance, surpassing a record set recently in Scotland. (NYT/Ruby Washington)

Youngsters warming up before taking part in Tap-O-Mania, an annual mass tap dance on West 34th Street yesterday. To the music of ''There's No Business like Show Business'' 4,497 participants donned hats and T-shirts for the tap dance, surpassing a record set recently in Scotland. (NYT/Ruby Washington)
